member.name: T:BookStore.Program.Program
member.summary: Main program class, handles user interface, initialization.

member.name: M:BookStore.Program.Program.Main
member.summary: User interface and initialization.

member.name: M:BookStore.Program.Program.ListNewBooksWithOldEditions(BookStore.Logic.UserLogic)
member.summary: Calls query "ListNewBooksWithOldEditions" and outputs results to console.

member.name: M:BookStore.Program.Program.ListAllAuthorsNumberOfEditions(BookStore.Logic.UserLogic)
member.summary: Calls query "ListAllAuthorsHowManyEditions" and outputs results to console.

member.name: M:BookStore.Program.Program.ListBooksWithLessThan10PcsWith10DayDelivery(BookStore.Logic.UserLogic)
member.summary: Calls query "ListBooksWithLessThan10PcsWith10DayDelivery" and outputs results to console.

member.name: M:BookStore.Program.Program.EnglishBooksByEnglishAuthorsForKids(BookStore.Logic.UserLogic)
member.summary: Calls query "ListEnglishBookForKids" and outputs results to console.

member.name: M:BookStore.Program.Program.ChangePrice(BookStore.Logic.SupplyManager)
member.summary: Writes all books to console, and asks user to chose which item's price they whish to modify. Calls ChangePrice function whith chosen index and new price.

member.name: M:BookStore.Program.Program.AddSupply(BookStore.Logic.SupplyManager)
member.summary: Writes all books to console, and asks user to chose which item's supply to add to. Calls AddSupply function to add value to current supply.

member.name: M:BookStore.Program.Program.ChangeSupply(BookStore.Logic.SupplyManager)
member.summary: Writes all books to console, and asks user to chose which item's supply change. Calls AddSupply function to change value of current supply.

member.name: M:BookStore.Program.Program.AddBookSupplyManager(BookStore.Logic.SupplyManager)
member.summary: Writes all authors and publishers and asks user values for a new book item. Calls AddBook function with the input values, and writes new item to console.

member.name: M:BookStore.Program.Program.UpdateItem(BookStore.Logic.AdminLogic)
member.summary: Asks user which table they wishes to modify items in. After calls UpdateBook, UpdateAuthor or UpdatePublisher function accordingly.

member.name: M:BookStore.Program.Program.UpdateBook(BookStore.Logic.AdminLogic)
member.summary: Writes all Book items to console, and asks which item to modify. Receaves input from user to what to modify book title and calls ChangeBookName function.

member.name: M:BookStore.Program.Program.UpdatePublisher(BookStore.Logic.AdminLogic)
member.summary: Writes all Publisher items to console. User can choose which item to modify and which value. Asks user input for new value, then calls corresponding function accordingly.

member.name: M:BookStore.Program.Program.UpdateAuthor(BookStore.Logic.AdminLogic)
member.summary: Writes all Author items to console. Asks user which item they wish to modify. Asks user which value they want to change. Then asks user the value to change to and then calls the corresponding logic function accortdingly.

member.name: M:BookStore.Program.Program.AddAuthor(BookStore.Logic.AdminLogic)
member.summary: Asks user input to which to create from new author item. Calls AddAuthor function with given input.

member.name: M:BookStore.Program.Program.DeletePublisher(BookStore.Logic.AdminLogic)
member.summary: Writes all publisher items to console, then asks user which item to delete. Calls DeletePublisher funcion with chosen index, if item exists.

member.name: M:BookStore.Program.Program.DeleteAuthor(BookStore.Logic.AdminLogic)
member.summary: Writes all author items to console, then asks user which item to delete. Calls DeleteAuthor funcion with chosen index, if item exists.

member.name: M:BookStore.Program.Program.DeleteBook(BookStore.Logic.AdminLogic)
member.summary: Writes all book items to console, then asks user which item to delete. Calls DeleteBook funcion with chosen index, if item exists.

member.name: M:BookStore.Program.Program.AddBook(BookStore.Logic.AdminLogic)
member.summary: Writes all authors and publishers to console and asks user input for new book item. Calls AddBook function with given values.

member.name: M:BookStore.Program.Program.AddPublisher(BookStore.Logic.AdminLogic)
member.summary: Asks user input for new publisher item. Calls AddPublisher function with given values.

member.name: M:BookStore.Program.Program.ListAllPublishers(BookStore.Logic.UserLogic)
member.summary: Writes all publisher items to console. Calls user.ListAllPublishers.

member.name: M:BookStore.Program.Program.ListAllAuthors(BookStore.Logic.UserLogic)
member.summary: Writes all author items to console. Calls user.ListAllAuthors.

member.name: M:BookStore.Program.Program.ListAllBooks(BookStore.Logic.UserLogic)
member.summary: Writes all book items to console. Calls user.ListAllBooks.
